About Me

Passionate about building secure and trustworthy AI systems

Background

AI Security Researcher & Fraud Detection Specialist with over 3 years of experience in banking fraud detection. My work focuses on securing federated learning systems against adversarial attacks while preserving data privacy through cryptographic techniques. I have completed 67 projects across AI Security, Federated Learning, and Production AI systems, with published research in steganography (Springer LNNS vol 285).

Current Focus

I've completed 67 projects across 4 comprehensive portfolios covering federated learning security, privacy-preserving phishing detection, production AI systems, and published steganography research. Currently focused on advancing trustworthy AI through adversarial robustness and cryptographic security.

Research Interests

  • Federated Learning Security (Byzantine robustness, secure aggregation)
  • Adversarial Machine Learning (Poisoning attacks, membership inference)
  • Privacy-Preserving AI (Differential privacy, homomorphic encryption, ZK proofs)
  • Cryptographic Security (ECDSA, commitment schemes, verifiable computation)

industry
